name: Ruler of All
description:
A narrator trying to reason with a shady protagonist. Sensible evil creatures, an unusual party and a missing villain.
Ruler of All is an interactive adventure that doesn't take itself seriously. Featuring relevant decisions, an actual battle, and 9 different endings!

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Click on the "run game" button to open it in full screen;
  • Use your mouse & click to select between the different dialog;
  • Refresh your browser if you want to restart the game;
  • Go back on your browser page to "pause" the game;
  • Click on the "restore game" button to resume where you left it;

WILL THIS GAME GET UPDATES?

Probably not, but I'll hotfix any issues found. Ruler of All was a side-project to learn the narrative tool Inky, and I have no further plans for it at the moment. With that said...

If you like my work and want to pressure me (with love) into making more games, come say hi on twitter:
@ddantonio5

CREDITS:

Written & programmed by Deborah D'Antonio.
Special thanks to Guilherme Pallas for beta testing!
Made with Inky.
